>
[Silencing Shot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1197)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><row><actions string="Single Action" /> envision</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This shimmering, golden-hued ammunition never makes any sound. A creature hit by a _silencing shot_ is subject to the effects of a 4th-level [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) spell (DC 25).

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _silence_ at 4th level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
